title: Bad Childhood, Good Life Week: Do My Parents Belong In My Life?
description:
Charlie was physically abused by his mother until his mid-teens. This abuse has taken its toll on his ability to be a good dad and has made it difficult to maintain a relationship with his parents. - Dr. Laura: "You don’t have the right to hold on to your fantasies when it hurts others."

What tolls are you holding on to? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “Bad Childhood, Good Life”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-bad-childhood-good-life

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
